languages.text: {n}Маражай смотрит на вас, на его лице написано раздраженное недоумение.{/n} "Мне неведомо, что именно творила Иремерисс и остатки кабала, пока я потрошил твои миры и играл с тобой. Охота на провидцев? Ха, сестре не откажешь в смелости — или отчаянии".

traits.locale_text: {n}Маражай смотрит на вас, на его лице написано раздраженное недоумение.{/n} "Мне неведомо, что именно творила Иремерисс и остатки кабала, пока я потрошил твои миры и играл с тобой. Охота на провидцев? Ха, сестре не откажешь в смелости — или отчаянии".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai looks at you with an expression of annoyed confusion.{/n} "I have no knowledge of what precisely Yremeryss and the rest of the Kabal were doing while I was busy gutting your worlds and toying with you. Hunting Farseers? You have to give it to her, she is brave. Or desperate."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай смотрит на вас, на его лице написано раздраженное недоумение.{/n} "Мне неведомо, что именно творила Иремерисс и остатки кабала, пока я потрошил твои миры и играл с тобой. Охота на провидцев? Ха, сестре не откажешь в смелости — или отчаянии".

languages.text: {n}Marazhai te mira con expresión confusa e irritada.{/n} «Ignoro a qué se dedicaban Yremeryss y el resto de la kábala mientras yo estaba ocupado eviscerando tus mundos y jugando contigo. ¿Pero cazar videntes? He de admitir que es valiente. O está desesperada».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks at you with an expression of annoyed confusion.{/n} "I have no knowledge of what precisely Yremeryss and the rest of the Kabal were doing while I was busy gutting your worlds and toying with you. Hunting Farseers? You have to give it to her, she is brave. Or desperate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai te mira con expresión confusa e irritada.{/n} «Ignoro a qué se dedicaban Yremeryss y el resto de la kábala mientras yo estaba ocupado eviscerando tus mundos y jugando contigo. ¿Pero cazar videntes? He de admitir que es valiente. O está desesperada».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイが困惑した表情であなたを見つめる。{/n} 「俺がお前らの惑星を破壊し、お前らをもてあそんでいる間に、イレメリスと陰謀団の残党が何をしていたのかなどは知らん。先見司狩りだと？認めざるを得ないな。彼女は勇敢だ。それか、必死なだけか」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks at you with an expression of annoyed confusion.{/n} "I have no knowledge of what precisely Yremeryss and the rest of the Kabal were doing while I was busy gutting your worlds and toying with you. Hunting Farseers? You have to give it to her, she is brave. Or desperate."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイが困惑した表情であなたを見つめる。{/n} 「俺がお前らの惑星を破壊し、お前らをもてあそんでいる間に、イレメリスと陰謀団の残党が何をしていたのかなどは知らん。先見司狩りだと？認めざるを得ないな。彼女は勇敢だ。それか、必死なだけか」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋看着你，看起来既恼怒，又困惑。{/n}“当我忙着破坏你的世界，和你玩游戏的时候，伊芮梅莉斯和阴谋团其他人居然在忙别的事情？我怎么一点都不知道？她居然敢狩猎先知？说真的，她要么是胆大包天，要么是狗急跳墙。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks at you with an expression of annoyed confusion.{/n} "I have no knowledge of what precisely Yremeryss and the rest of the Kabal were doing while I was busy gutting your worlds and toying with you. Hunting Farseers? You have to give it to her, she is brave. Or desperate."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋看着你，看起来既恼怒，又困惑。{/n}“当我忙着破坏你的世界，和你玩游戏的时候，伊芮梅莉斯和阴谋团其他人居然在忙别的事情？我怎么一点都不知道？她居然敢狩猎先知？说真的，她要么是胆大包天，要么是狗急跳墙。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai vous regarde avec une expression de confusion et de contrariété.{/n} « Je n'ai aucune idée de ce qu'ont fait Yremeryss et le reste de la kabale pendant que j'étais occupé à éviscérer vos mondes et à jouer avec vous. Chasser des Grands Prophètes ? Elle est courageuse, il faut bien l'admettre. Ou désespérée. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks at you with an expression of annoyed confusion.{/n} "I have no knowledge of what precisely Yremeryss and the rest of the Kabal were doing while I was busy gutting your worlds and toying with you. Hunting Farseers? You have to give it to her, she is brave. Or desperate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai vous regarde avec une expression de confusion et de contrariété.{/n} « Je n'ai aucune idée de ce qu'ont fait Yremeryss et le reste de la kabale pendant que j'étais occupé à éviscérer vos mondes et à jouer avec vous. Chasser des Grands Prophètes ? Elle est courageuse, il faut bien l'admettre. Ou désespérée. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai blickt dich genervt und verwirrt an.{/n} "Ich weiß nicht genau, was Yremeryss und der Rest der Kabale machten, als ich Eure Welten zerstörte und mit Euch spielte. Runenpropheten jagen? Eines muss man ihr lassen, sie ist mutig. Oder verzweifelt."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks at you with an expression of annoyed confusion.{/n} "I have no knowledge of what precisely Yremeryss and the rest of the Kabal were doing while I was busy gutting your worlds and toying with you. Hunting Farseers? You have to give it to her, she is brave. Or desperate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai blickt dich genervt und verwirrt an.{/n} "Ich weiß nicht genau, was Yremeryss und der Rest der Kabale machten, als ich Eure Welten zerstörte und mit Euch spielte. Runenpropheten jagen? Eines muss man ihr lassen, sie ist mutig. Oder verzweifelt."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, kızgınlığın getirdiği şaşkınlıkla sana bakıyor.{/n} "Ben dünyalarınızın içini dışına çıkarıp sizlerle bir güzel oynamakla meşguldüm. O sırada Yremeryss ile Kabal'ın geri kalanının tam olarak ne yaptığını bilmiyorum. Demek Ötesezen avlıyorlardı... Haklarını yemeyeyim, çok cesurca. Belki de çaresizce."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks at you with an expression of annoyed confusion.{/n} "I have no knowledge of what precisely Yremeryss and the rest of the Kabal were doing while I was busy gutting your worlds and toying with you. Hunting Farseers? You have to give it to her, she is brave. Or desperate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, kızgınlığın getirdiği şaşkın bir ifadeyle sana bakıyor.{/n} "Ben dünyalarınızın içini dışına çıkarıp sizlerle bir güzel oyun oynamakla meşguldüm. O sırada Yremeryss ile Kabaldan geri kalanların tam olarak ne yaptığı konusunda bir bilgim yok. Ötesezenleri avlamak, ha? Hakkını yemeyeyim, bayağı cesurmuş. Çaresiz de olabilir elbette."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
